DisplayedItem.name: DI_49335
DisplayedItem.title: Reporting of pN and (when applicable) pM category is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

Property.name: p_rptTxt_49335_1
Property.val: Reporting of pN and (when applicable) pM category is based on information available to the pathologist at the time the report is issued. As per the AJCC (Chapter 1, 8th Ed.) it is the managing physician’s responsibility to establish the final pathologic stage based upon all pertinent information, including but potentially not limited to this pathology report.

ListItem.name: LI_327731
ListItem.title: pN not assigned (cannot be determined based on available pathological information)

ListItem.name: LI_7456
ListItem.title: pN0: No regional lymph node metastasis

ListItem.name: LI_7457
ListItem.title: pN1: Metastasis with a lymph node mass 2 cm or smaller in greatest dimension and less than or equal to five nodes positive, none larger than 2 cm in greatest dimension

ListItem.name: LI_7458
ListItem.title: pN2: Metastasis with a lymph node mass larger than 2 cm but not larger than 5 cm in greatest dimension; or more than five nodes positive, none larger than 5 cm; or evidence of extranodal extension of tumor

ListItem.name: LI_7459
ListItem.title: pN3: Metastasis with a lymph node mass larger than 5 cm in greatest dimension
